May 1st, 1880. Catalogues of the students attending the early sessions have never before been published. James F. Harrison, Chairman.
BOARD OF VISITORS. JAMES MADISON, Rector. JAMES MADISON, CHAPMAN JOHNSON, JOSEPH C. CABELL, JAMES BRECKENRIDGE, JOHN H. COCKE, GEORGE LOYALL. JAMES MONROE. Secretary of the Board, NICHOLAS P. TRIST

FACULTY AND OFFICERS. JOHN TAYLOE LOMAX, Chairman of the Faculty. GEORGE LONG, Professor of Ancient Languages. GEO. BLÃTTERMANN, Professor of Modern Languages. TH: HEWITT KEY, Professor of Mathematics. CHARLES BONNYCASTLE, Professor of Natural Philosophy. JOHN P. EMMET, Professor of Chemistry and Mat. Med. GEORGE TUCKER, Professor of Moral Philosophy. ROBLEY DUNGLISON, Professor of Physiology, Medicine, Obstetrics and Medical Jurisprudence. JOHN TAYLOE LOMAX, Professor of Law. THOMAS JOHNSON, Demonstrator of Anatomy (and Surgery.) WILLIAM WERTENBAKER, Librarian and Secretary of the Faculty. ARTHUR S. BROCKNBROUGH, Proctor. ALEXANDER GARRETT, Bursar.
